sql.query: select doc_cbsid, doc_accountnumber,per.personal_custname, DOC_ACCFLAG from MON_DOCUMENTREGISTER doc, mon_limitregister limitreg,MON_PERSONALINFO per, organisations org where (to_date(to_char(doc_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(doc_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 90 and doc.DOC_DELFLAG='N' and doc_expirydate is not null and doc.doc_accountnumber=limitreg.limit_cutaccno and per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid=limitreg.limit_custid and limitreg.limit_status='O' and limitreg.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by DOC_ACCFLAG desc

select MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER,limit_custid, per.personal_custname, LIMIT_ACCFLAG from MON_SECURITYREGISTER sec, mon_limitregister lim , organisations org,MON_PERSONALINFO per where sec.MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER=lim.limit_cutaccno and MONSEC_SAMEADDRESS='2' and per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid=lim.limit_custid and lim.LIMIT_STATUS='O' and lim.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by LIMIT_ACCFLAG desc

select ins_cbsid, ins_accountno, per.personal_custname, INS_ACCFLAG, ins_srlno from INSURANCE_REGISTER ins, MON_PERSONALINFO per, mon_limitregister lim, organisations org where (to_date(to_char(INS_EXPIRYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(INS_EXPIRYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 90 and ins.ins_delflag='N' and INS_EXPIRYDATE is not null and ins.ins_accountno=lim.limit_cutaccno and per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid=lim.limit_custid and lim.limit_status='O' and lim.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by INS_ACCFLAG desc

select lc_cbsid, lc_bills_no, per.personal_custname from mon_lc lc, MON_PERSONALINFO per, organisations org where LC_STATUS ='D' and LC_BILLS_NOTIONAL_DATE is not null and (to_date(to_char(LC_BILLS_NOTIONAL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(LC_BILLS_NOTIONAL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 10 and lc.LC_CBSID=per.personal_cbsid and org.solid=per.personal_solid and org.org_code='^'

select FUND_OVERDUEAMT, fund_custid, fund_accno, FUND_SCHEMECODE, FUND_OVERDUETYPE, fund_sancamt, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER, per.personal_custname from MON_FUNDBASED fun, MON_PERSONALINFO per, organisations org,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon where FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and trim(alertfor)='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and fun.FUND_SCHEMECODE not in ('DL003', 'DL002', 'DL004', 'DL011', 'DL012') and per.personal_classification='001' and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select fund_custid, fund_accno, per.personal_custname, FUND_OVERDUETYPE,fund_overdueamt,fund_sancamt from MON_FUNDBASED fun, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon, MON_PERSONALINFO per, organisations org where alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(fund_dormantsince,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(fund_dormantsince,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')^ daysupto and FUND_ACCSTATUS ='D' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and per.personal_classification='001' and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select BILLS_CBSID, bills_accno, per.personal_custname, bills_billno, to_char(BILLS_BILLDUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as billduedate, BILLS_BILLAMT, bills_accflag,limit_sanctamt,bills_overdueamt from mon_personalinfo per, mon_limitregister limit, mon_bills a, organisations org, mon_assetclassification mon where (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(BILLS_BILLDUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(BILLS_BILLDUEDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and BILLS_BILLDUEDATE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and BILLS_OVERDUEAMT>0 and per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid= limit.limit_custid and a.bills_accno= limit.limit_cutaccno and a.bills_cbsid= limit.limit_custid and limit.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by a.bills_accflag desc

select fund_accno, fund_custid, per.personal_custname, FUND_OVERDUETYPE from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_SCHEMECODE is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and fun.FUND_SCHEMECODE in ('DL021','DL022')and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select fund_custid, fund_accno, per.personal_custname,FUND_OVERDUETYPE from MON_FUNDBASED fun, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon, MON_PERSONALINFO per, organisations org where FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUEAMT ^ 0 and FUND_OSAMT > FUND_SANCAMT and fund_schemecode in('ODGCC','ODGEN','ODMOR','ODSTF','CCAGR','CCCYC','CCGEN','CCPLG','CCSME','CCUTR','CCWCD','IB001', 'IB002','IB003','IB004','IB005','IB006','IB007','IB008','IB009','IB010','IB011')and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select fund_custid, fund_accno, per.personal_custname, FUND_OVERDUETYPE from MON_FUNDBASED fun, MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon, MON_PERSONALINFO per, organisations org where FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUEAMT ^ 0 and FUND_OSAMT > FUND_SANCAMT and fund_schemecode not in('ODGCC','ODGEN','ODMOR','ODSTF','CCAGR','CCCYC','CCGEN','CCPLG','CCSME','CCUTR','CCWCD','IB001', 'IB002','IB003','IB004','IB005','IB006','IB007','IB008','IB009','IB010','IB011')and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select fund_accno, fund_custid, per.personal_custname, FUND_OVERDUETYPE, FUND_SCHEMECODE,fund_overdueamt,fund_sancamt from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUETYPE is not null and FUND_SCHEMECODE is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and fun.FUND_SCHEMECODE in ('DL011','DL012','DL002','DL003', 'DL004')and per.personal_classification='001' and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select fund_accno,fund_custid, per.personal_custname, FUND_OVERDUETYPE from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where FUND_ACCSTATUS !='C' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUETYPE is not null and FUND_SCHEMECODE is not null and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and fun.FUND_SCHEMECODE ='DL004' and fun.fund_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=fun.fund_solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select limit_custid,limit_cutaccno, per.personal_custname, mon.LIMIT_ACCFLAG from mon_limitregister mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where per.personal_cbsid=mon.limit_custid and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 30 and limit_reviewdate is not null and mon.LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and mon.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by mon.LIMIT_ACCFLAG DESC

select distinct FUND_OVERDUEAMT, fund_custid, fund_accno, FUND_SCHEMECODE, FUND_OVERDUETYPE, fund_sancamt, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER, per.personal_custname from MON_FUNDBASED fun,MON_ASSETCLASSIFICATION mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where FUND_ACCSTATUS='A' and FUND_OVERDUESINCE is not null and alertfor='^' and mon.assetclassification='^' and FUND_OVERDUEAMT>0 and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and fun.FUND_SCHEMECODE not in ('DL003', 'DL002', 'DL004', 'DL011', 'DL012') and per.personal_classification='001' and per.PERSONAL_CBSID=fun.fund_custid and fun.fund_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by FUND_OVERDUETYPE desc

select limit_custid,limit_cutaccno, per.personal_custname, mon.LIMIT_ACCFLAG from mon_limitregister mon,mon_assetclassification,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where limit_reviewdate is not null and alertfor='^' and assetclassification='^' and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and per.personal_classification='001' and mon.limit_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and mon.limit_solid=org.solid and mon.LIMIT_STATUS ='O' and org.org_code='^' order by mon.LIMIT_ACCFLAG DESC

select limit_custid mmr_cbsid , limit_cutaccno, per.personal_custname, a.limit_accflag, a.limit_sanctamt from mon_limitregister a ,mon_assetclassification ,mon_personalinfo per, organisations org, postinspectionreport b where postins_visitdate is not null and alertfor='^' and assetclassification='^' and a.limit_custid=b.postins_cbsid and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(postins_visitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysfrom and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(postins_visitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ daysupto and per.personal_classification='001' and a.limit_custid=per.PERSONAL_CBSID and b.postins_cbsid=a.limit_custid and org.solid=a.limit_solid and a.LIMIT_STATUS='O' and org.org_code='^' and per.personal_cbsid=b.postins_cbsid and postins_visitdate=(select max(postins_visitdate)from postinspectionreport where postins_cbsid=per.personal_cbsid) order by a.limit_accflag desc

select ins_cbsid ,ins_accountno, per.personal_custname, ins.ins_accflag, ins.ins_srlno,limreg.limit_sanctamt from INSURANCE_REGISTER ins, MON_PERSONALINFO per, mon_limitregister limreg, organisations org where per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid=ins.ins_cbsid and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))- (to_date(to_char(INS_EXPIRYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')) >0 and INS_EXPIRYDATE is not null and ins.ins_delflag='N' and ins.ins_accountno= limreg.limit_cutaccno and limreg.limit_status='O' and limreg.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by ins.ins_accflag desc

select ins_cbsid, monsec_accountnumber, INS_COVERAMT, per.personal_custname, c.ins_accflag, c.ins_srlno from MON_SECURITYREGISTER b ,INSURANCE_REGISTER c, MON_PERSONALINFO per, mon_limitregister limitreg, organisations org where c.INS_COVERAMT ^ b.MONSEC_VALUATAMOUNT and b.monsec_insuranceno=c.ins_policyno and c.ins_delflag='N' and b.monsec_accountnumber=c.ins_accountno and c.ins_accountno= limitreg.limit_cutaccno and per.personal_cbsid= limitreg.limit_custid and limitreg.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by c.ins_accflag

select doc_accountnumber, doc_cbsid, per.personal_custname, doc.DOC_ACCFLAG,limitreg.limit_sanctamt from MON_DOCUMENTREGISTER doc, MON_PERSONALINFO per, mon_limitregister limitreg, organisations org where per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid= doc.doc_cbsid and (to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(DOC_EXECUTEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') > 30 and DOC_DATEVETTED is null and DOC_EXECUTEDDATE is not null and doc.DOC_DELFLAG='N' and doc.doc_accountnumber= limitreg.limit_cutaccno and limitreg.limit_status='O' and limitreg.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by doc.DOC_ACCFLAG desc

select limit_custid, cbs_accno, b.personal_custname, lr.limit_accflag,lr.limit_sanctamt from mon_checklist a, MON_PERSONALINFO b, organisations org, mon_limitregister lr where mon_dbcdate is not null and mon_dbcamount is not null and months_between(to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(to_char(mon_dbcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))>12 and b.personal_classification='001' and lr.limit_custid=b.PERSONAL_CBSID and lr.limit_solid=org.solid and lr.limit_cutaccno=a.cbs_accno and lr.LIMIT_STATUS='O' and org.org_code='^' order by lr.limit_accflag desc

select MON_ACCWISEACCOUNTNO,ACCTWISE_CBSID, to_char(mon_nextbookdebtsdue,'dd/mm/yyyy')as bookdebtsdue, to_char(mon_nextstockdue,'dd/mm/yyyy')as stockdue, per.personal_custname from MON_ACCOUNTWISEDETAILS, MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where MON_NEXTBOOKDEBTSDUE is not null and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(MON_NEXTBOOKDEBTSDUE,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ and to_date(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(MON_NEXTBOOKDEBTSDUE,'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ and org.solid=per.personal_solid and org.org_code='^' and mon_year=(select max(to_number(mon_year))from MON_ACCOUNTWISEDETAILS where ACCTWISE_CBSID=per.personal_CBSID) and mon_month=(select max(to_number(mon_month))from MON_ACCOUNTWISEDETAILS where ACCTWISE_CBSID=per.personal_CBSID) and ACCTWISE_CBSID=per.personal_CBSID

select CBS_ACCNO,limit_custid, c.personal_custname, b.limit_accflag,b.limit_sanctamt from MON_CHECKLIST a, mon_limitregister b, MON_PERSONALINFO c, organisations org where MON_EQUITABLE is not null and MON_EQUITPERFECT is not null and upper(MON_EQUITABLE)='Y' and upper(MON_EQUITPERFECT)='N' and a.CBS_ACCNO=b.LIMIT_CUTACCNO and b.limit_custid=c.PERSONAL_CBSID and c.personal_classification='001' and org.solid=b.limit_solid and b.LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and org.org_code='^' order by b.limit_accflag desc

select limit_custid, limit_cutaccno, c.personal_custname, b.limit_accflag, b.limit_sanctamt from MON_CHECKLIST a, mon_limitregister b, MON_PERSONALINFO c, organisations org where (mon_roc is null or mon_roc='n') and a.CBS_ACCNO(+)=b.LIMIT_CUTACCNO and c.personal_classification='001' and b.limit_custid=c.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=b.limit_solid and b.LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and org.org_code='^' and c.PERSONAL_CONSTITUTION in ('005','006') order by b.limit_accflag desc

select DOC_ACCOUNTNUMBER,limit_custid, c.personal_custname, a.doc_accflag, b.limit_sanctamt from MON_DOCUMENTREGISTER a, mon_limitregister b,MON_PERSONALINFO c, organisations org where DOC_APPLICANTYPE is not null and DOC_SIGNED is not null and upper(DOC_APPLICANTYPE) = 'GUA' and upper(DOC_SIGNED)='N' and a.DOC_ACCOUNTNUMBER=b.LIMIT_CUTACCNO and c.personal_classification='001' and b.limit_custid=c.PERSONAL_CBSID and a.DOC_CBSID=c.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=b.limit_solid and b.LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and a.DOC_DELFLAG='N' and org.org_code='^' order by a.doc_accflag desc

select distinct personal_cbsid, personal_custname, org_name, org_scode, personal_solid, personal_classification from MON_PERSONALINFO, mon_limitregister, organisations where limit_custid=personal_cbsid and limit_solid=solid and upper(personal_custname) like upper('%^%') ^

select distinct personal_cbsid, personal_custname, org_name, org_scode, personal_solid, personal_classification from MON_PERSONALINFO, mon_limitregister, organisations where solid=limit_solid and limit_custid=personal_cbsid and personal_cbsid='^' ^
select limit_custid,limit_cutaccno,limit_facility, limit_status from mon_limitregister where limit_custid='^'
select stat_data_sno, stat_data_desc, stat_data_id, stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='36' and stat_data_desc='^'order by stat_data_sno

select limit_custid, limit_sanctamt, to_char(limit_sanctdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_sanctdate, limit_margin,limit_roi,limit_facility, to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_reviewdate, limit_sancrefno, limit_sancauth, to_char(limit_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_expirydate, limit_type, limit_remarks, limit_modifiedby, to_char(limit_modifieddate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as limit_modifieddate,mon_reviewof, mon_marginbookdebt, limit_sanctionlevel from mon_limitregister where limit_cutaccno='^'
update mon_limitregister set limit_remarks=?, LIMIT_MARGIN=?, limit_modifiedby=?, limit_modifieddate=sysdate, mon_reviewof=?, mon_marginbookdebt=? where limit_cutaccno=?
select stat_data_sno, stat_data_desc, stat_data_id, stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='21' and stat_data_desc='^'order by stat_data_sno

select ins_srlno,ins_seqid, ins_cbsid, ins_security, ins_company, ins_policyno, ins_clause, ins_coveramt, ins_premiumamt, ins_paid_by, ins_beneficiary, to_char(ins_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, ins_risk, ins_details, ins_covernote, to_char(ins_policydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as policydate, to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_riskfactor,ins_insuredaddr1, ins_insuredaddr2, ins_insuredaddr3, ins_insuredcity, ins_insuredstate,ins_insuredpincode,ins_accountno from insurance_register where ins_accountno='^' and ins_cbsid='^' and ins_delflag='N'

select ins_srlno,ins_seqid, ins_cbsid, ins_security, ins_company, ins_policyno, ins_clause, ins_coveramt, ins_premiumamt, ins_paid_by, ins_beneficiary, to_char(ins_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, ins_risk, ins_details, ins_covernote, to_char(ins_policydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as policydate, to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_riskfactor,ins_insuredaddr1, ins_insuredaddr2, ins_insuredaddr3, ins_insuredcity, ins_insuredstate,ins_insuredpincode,ins_accountno from insurance_register where ins_accountno='^' and ins_cbsid='^' and ins_srlno='^' and ins_delflag='N'

select ins_srlno,ins_seqid, ins_cbsid, ins_security, ins_company, ins_policyno, ins_clause, ins_coveramt, ins_premiumamt, ins_paid_by, ins_beneficiary, to_char(ins_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, ins_risk, ins_details, ins_covernote, to_char(ins_policydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as policydate, to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_riskfactor,ins_insuredaddr1, ins_insuredaddr2, ins_insuredaddr3, ins_insuredcity, ins_insuredstate,ins_insuredpincode,ins_accountno from insurance_register,mon_secuinsumap where ins_accountno='^' and ins_cbsid='^' and ins_srlno=mon_insuslrno and ins_delflag='N'

select limit_facility,personal_cbsid,personal_custname, stat_data_desc1,MON_REVIEWOF from MON_PERSONALINFO, mon_limitregister, static_data where personal_cbsid=limit_custid and limit_cutaccno='^' and stat_data_id='36' and stat_data_desc=limit_facility

select monsec_sno, monsec_accountnumber, monsec_securitytype,monsec_securitynature,monsec_otherdetails, monsec_add1,monsec_add2,monsec_city,monsec_state, monsec_pincode, monsec_insuranceno, monsec_valuatamount, to_char(monsec_valuatdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as monsec_valuatdate,monsec_valutdoneby, monsec_inspectedby, to_char(monsec_inspectedon,'dd/mm/yyyy') as monsec_inspectedon, monsec_sameaddress, stat_data_desc1, stat_data_sno, monsec_shortfallnoticed, monsec_maskflag from mon_securityregister, static_data where stat_data_desc(+)=monsec_securitynature and stat_data_id(+)='46' and monsec_maskflag='N' and monsec_accountnumber='^' order by monsec_sno

update mon_securityregister set monsec_securitytype=?, monsec_securitynature=?, monsec_otherdetails=?, monsec_add1=?, monsec_add2=?, monsec_city=?, monsec_state=?, monsec_pincode=?, monsec_insuranceno=?, monsec_valuatamount=?, monsec_valuatdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), monsec_valutdoneby=?, monsec_inspectedon=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), monsec_inspectedby=?, monsec_sameaddress=?, user_id=?, monsec_datemodified=sysdate, monsec_shortfallnoticed=?, monsec_maskflag=? where monsec_sno=? and monsec_accountnumber=?

insert into mon_securityregister (monsec_sno, monsec_accountnumber, monsec_securitytype, monsec_securitynature, monsec_otherdetails, monsec_add1, monsec_add2, monsec_city, monsec_state, monsec_pincode, monsec_insuranceno, monsec_valuatamount, monsec_valuatdate, monsec_valutdoneby, monsec_inspectedon, monsec_inspectedby, monsec_sameaddress, user_id, monsec_datemodified, monsec_shortfallnoticed, monsec_maskflag) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)
update mon_securityregister set monsec_maskflag=? where monsec_sno=? and monsec_accountnumber=?
delete from mon_securityregister where monsec_sno=? and monsec_accountnumber=?
select NVL(max(MONSEC_SNO),0)+1 as snorelmax from MON_SECURITYREGISTER where trim(MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER)='^'

select doc_sno, doc_accountnumber, doc_documentname, to_char(doc_executeddate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as doc_executeddate, doc_executedby, doc_signatoryname, to_char(doc_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_expirydate, doc_vettedby, to_char(doc_datevetted,'dd/mm/yyyy')as doc_datevetted, doc_modifiedby, to_char(doc_datemodified,'dd/mm/yyyy') as doc_datemodified, doc_applicantype, doc_signed from mon_documentregister where doc_accountnumber='^' and DOC_DELFLAG='N'

select cbs_accno, mon_roc, to_char(mon_rocdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as mon_rocdate, to_char(mon_resolutiondate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as mon_resolutiondate, mon_dbc, to_char(mon_dbcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as mon_dbcdate, mon_dbcamount, mon_guarantor, mon_guarantorsigned, mon_equitable, mon_equitperfect, mon_checkmsod, mon_checkstock, mon_checkbkdebts, mon_checkqpr, mon_inspection from mon_checklist where cbs_accno='^'
delete from mon_checklist where cbs_accno=?

insert into mon_checklist(cbs_accno, mon_roc, mon_rocdate, mon_resolutiondate, mon_dbc,mon_dbcdate, mon_dbcamount, mon_guarantor, mon_guarantorsigned, mon_equitable, mon_equitperfect, mon_modifiedby, mon_modifieddate, mon_checkmsod, mon_checkstock, mon_checkbkdebts, mon_checkqpr, mon_inspection) values (?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?)
select to_char(personal_bankingsince, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as personal_bankingsince from mon_personalinfo where personal_cbsid = '^'

select to_char(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as LIMIT_REVIEWDATE, LIMIT_SANCTAMT,stat_data_desc1 as limit_facility from mon_limitregister,static_data where stat_data_desc=limit_facility and stat_data_id='36' and limit_custid = '^' and trim(limit_cutaccno) = '^'
select to_char(add_months(to_date('^','dd/mm/yyyy'),'12'),'Month-yyyy') as nextreview from mon_limitregister where limit_custid ='^' and trim(limit_cutaccno) = '^'
select to_char(dbc_date, 'DD/MM/YYYY') as dbc_date from mon_dbc where dbc_cbsid='^' and trim(dbc_accno) = '^'
select FUND_OVERDUEAMT, to_char(fund_overduesince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fund_overduesince, FUND_OSAMT from MON_FUNDBASED where fund_custid='^' and trim(fund_accno)='^'

select cbsid, cbsAccountNo, seqno, natureValSecurity, presentStatusPrj, operationCDAcc, maxDebit, maxCredit, minDebit, minCredit, daysDebit, operTermLoanACC, repaySchedule, installment, interest, compliance, completionMort, registCharge, documents, collSecurityDet, to_char(inspectionDate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as inspectionDate, secAdequtely, inspectingOfficial, auditObserv, recommendation, activity, to_char(banksince,'DD/MM/YYYY') as banksince, to_char(reviewdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as reviewdate, osamt, overdue, to_char(dbcdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as dbcdate, reviewyear, REVIEW_STATUS, review_comments,daysCredit,to_char(DISBURSEMENTDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as DISBURSEMENTDATE,assetclasification, a.stat_data_desc1 as assetclasificationdesc,reveiw_loanpurpose, reveiw_datecredit , reveiw_installremarks ,reveiw_interestremarks ,REVIEW_FACILITYNAME , REVIEW_FACILITYLIMIT , to_char(review_nextreviewdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as review_nextreviewdate,to_char(review_processdate,'DD/MM/YYYY') as review_processdate from reviewnotetermloan,static_data a where a.stat_data_desc(+) =assetclasification and a.stat_data_id(+)='31' and trim(cbsid) = '^' and trim(cbsAccountNo) = '^' and reviewyear = '^'
select MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_TOUSRID from MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_MAILBOX where trim(MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_CBSID)='^' and trim(MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_CBSACCNO)='^'and MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_YEAR='^'

update reviewnotetermloan set natureValSecurity=?, presentStatusPrj=?, operationCDAcc=?, maxDebit=?, maxCredit=?, minDebit=?, minCredit=?, daysDebit=?, operTermLoanACC=?, repaySchedule=?, installment=?, interest=?, compliance=?, completionMort=?, registCharge=?, documents=?, collSecurityDet=?, inspectionDate=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), secAdequtely=?, inspectingOfficial=?, auditObserv=?, recommendation=?, activity=?, banksince=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), reviewdate = to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), osamt=?, overdue=?, dbcdate=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),daysCredit=?,DISBURSEMENTDATE=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), assetclasification = ?, reveiw_loanpurpose=?, reveiw_datecredit= ? , reveiw_installremarks = ? , reveiw_interestremarks = ? , review_facilityname = ? , review_facilitylimit = ? , review_nextreviewdate = to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY') where cbsid=? and cbsAccountNo=? and reviewyear=?
delete from reviewnotetermloan where cbsid=? and cbsAccountNo=? and reviewyear=?

select MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER, limit_custid, b.personal_custname, lr.limit_accflag,lr.limit_sanctamt from MON_SECURITYREGISTER a, MON_PERSONALINFO b, organisations org, mon_limitregister lr where MONSEC_VALUATDATE is not null and months_between(to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(to_char(MONSEC_VALUATDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))>36 and b.personal_classification='001' and lr.limit_custid=b.PERSONAL_CBSID and org.solid=lr.limit_solid and a.MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER=lr.limit_cutaccno and lr.LIMIT_STATUS !='C' and MONSEC_MASKFLAG='N' and MONSEC_VALUATDATE in (select min(MONSEC_VALUATDATE) from MON_SECURITYREGISTER,mon_limitregister where MONSEC_MASKFLAG='N' and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER=limit_cutaccno group by MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER) and org.org_code='^' order by lr.limit_accflag desc

select monsec_securitytype, MONSEC_OTHERDETAILS, monsec_insuranceno, limit_cutaccno, stat_data_desc1,monsec_valuatamount from MON_SECURITYREGISTER a, mon_limitregister b, static_data where a.monsec_accountnumber (+) =b.limit_cutaccno and stat_data_desc(+) =monsec_securitynature and stat_data_id='46' and trim(limit_custid)='^'

select personal_cbsid, personal_custname, personal_solid, personal_natofactivity, personal_bankarrangement, personal_address, personal_address1, c.city_name as city, s.state_name as state, personal_pincode, personal_phone, personal_mobile, stat_data_desc1 as personal_constitution, to_char(personal_bankingsince,'dd/mm/yyyy')as personal_bankingsince, personal_contactname, personal_contperdesign, personal_contperphone, personal_contpermobile, personal_constitution as new_personal_constitution,personal_leadbankvetted,personal_stipdocuments from mon_personalinfo, laps_cities c, laps_states s, static_data where personal_cbsid='^' and upper(c.city_code(+))=upper(trim(personal_city)) and upper(s.state_code(+))=upper(trim(personal_state)) and stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=personal_constitution
select org_name from organisations where solid='^'
select mmr_month, mmr_year, mmr_orgscode, mmr_status,mmr_rptholder,org_name from mon_monthlyreport,organisations where org_scode=mmr_orgscode and trim(mmr_cbsid)='^' order by mmr_year, mmr_month

insert into mon_mmrfundbased(MMRFUND_CUSTID, MMRFUND_ACCNO, MMRFUND_FACILITY, MMRFUND_SANCAMT, MMRFUND_DRAWINGPOWER, MMRFUND_OSAMT, MMRFUND_OVERDUEAMT, MMRFUND_OVERDUESINCE, MMRFUND_DEBITCURRMONTH, MMRFUND_CREDITCURRMONTH, MMRFUND_CREDITURNOVER, MMRFUND_INSTALMENT, MMRFUND_MODIFIEDBY, MMRFUND_MODIFIEDDATE, MMRFUND_MONTH, MMRFUND_YEAR, mmrfund_mmrno) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)

select MMRFUND_CUSTID, MMRFUND_ACCNO, MMRFUND_FACILITY, MMRFUND_SANCAMT, MMRFUND_DRAWINGPOWER, MMRFUND_OSAMT, MMRFUND_OVERDUEAMT, to_char(MMRFUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MMRFUND_OVERDUESINCE, MMRFUND_DEBITCURRMONTH, MMRFUND_CREDITCURRMONTH, MMRFUND_CREDITURNOVER, MMRFUND_INSTALMENT, to_char(MMRFUND_MODIFIEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MMRFUND_MODIFIEDDATE from mon_mmrfundbased where mmrfund_mmrno='^'

select mon_operation, mon_operationdetails, mon_sanction, mon_sanctiondetails, mon_irregular, mon_irregulardetails, mon_observation, mon_observationdetails,mon_limits,mon_limitsreason ,mon_noname,mon_nodesgn,mon_ainame,mon_aidesgn,mon_bhname,mon_bhdesgn from mon_branchheadcomments where mon_commentsmmrno='^'

insert into mon_branchheadcomments(cbs_id, mon_operation, mon_operationdetails, mon_sanction, mon_sanctiondetails, mon_irregular, mon_irregulardetails, mon_observation, mon_observationdetails, mon_commentsyear,mon_commentsmonth, mon_modifiedby, mon_modifieddate, mon_commentsmmrno, mon_limits,mon_limitsreason,mon_noname,mon_nodesgn,mon_ainame,mon_aidesgn,mon_bhname,mon_bhdesgn) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from mon_branchheadcomments where mon_commentsmmrno=?
select mon_commentsyear, mon_commentsmonth from mon_branchheadcomments where trim(cbs_id)='^'
select mon_commentsyear, mon_commentsmonth from mon_branchheadcomments where trim(cbs_id)='^' and mon_commentsyear='^'
delete from mon_auditcomments where mon_audittype=? and mon_mmrno=?
insert into mon_auditcomments (mon_custid, mon_audittype, mon_auditorcomments, mon_officerscomments, mon_auditdate, mon_year, mon_month, mon_mmrno) values (?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
select mon_custid,mon_auditorcomments, mon_officerscomments, to_char(mon_auditdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_auditdate, mon_audittype from mon_auditcomments where mon_audittype='^' and mon_mmrno='^'
delete from mmr_monitoringinfo where mmrinfo_mmrno=?

select mmr_cbsid, to_char(mmr_infoinspectiondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mmr_infoinspectiondate, mmr_infotermscond, mmr_infoprofitabilty, mmr_infocolenders, mmr_infomanageperson, mmr_infotermreason, mmr_infoadversedreason, mmr_infoprofitabiltyreason, mmr_infocolendersreason, mmr_infomanagepersonreason, mmr_infomonth, mmr_infoyear, mon_salesquarter, mon_salesamount from mmr_monitoringinfo where mmrinfo_mmrno='^'
delete from mon_monitorinformation where mon_monitmmrno=?

insert into mon_monitorinformation (mon_monitinfcbsid, mon_monitinfgovtpolicy, mon_monitinfqpr, mon_monitinfpenalinterst, mon_monitinfledger, mon_monitinfrectification, mon_monitinfgovtpolicyrson, mon_monitinfpenalinterstrson, mon_monitinfrectificationrson, mon_monitinfnonsecrutiniserson, mon_monitinfmonth, mon_monitinfyear, mon_turnover, mon_turnoverreasons, mon_monitmmrno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select mon_monitinfcbsid, mon_monitinfgovtpolicy, mon_monitinfqpr, mon_monitinfpenalinterst, mon_monitinfledger, mon_monitinfrectification, mon_monitinfgovtpolicyrson, mon_monitinfpenalinterstrson, mon_monitinfrectificationrson, mon_monitinfnonsecrutiniserson, mon_monitinfmonth, mon_monitinfyear,mon_turnover,mon_turnoverreasons from mon_monitorinformation where mon_monitmmrno='^'
delete from mmr_inspectionreport where mmr_cbsid=? and mmr_month=? and mmr_year=?

insert into mmr_inspectionreport (mmr_cbsid, mmr_insvisitdate, mmr_insname1, mmr_insname2, mmr_insname3, mmr_insdesign1, mmr_insdesign2, mmr_insdesign3, mmr_insnorth, mmr_inseast, mmr_inswest, mmr_inssouth, mmr_insprimarysecurity, mmr_inscollsecurity, mmr_inspresentstatus, mmr_inscomments, mmr_insdocument, mmr_insfeatures, mmr_insbanknameboard, mmr_insborrowernamebord, mmr_insmaintanance, mmr_month, mmr_year, mmr_security,mmr_shorfalldeficiency) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select mmr_cbsid,to_char(mmr_insvisitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mmr_insvisitdate, mmr_insname1, mmr_insname2, mmr_insname3, mmr_insdesign1, mmr_insdesign2, mmr_insdesign3, mmr_insnorth, mmr_inseast, mmr_inswest, mmr_inssouth, mmr_insprimarysecurity, mmr_inscollsecurity, mmr_inspresentstatus,mmr_inscomments, mmr_insdocument, mmr_insfeatures, mmr_insbanknameboard, mmr_insborrowernamebord, mmr_insmaintanance, mmr_month, mmr_year, mmr_security, mmr_shorfalldeficiency from mmr_inspectionreport where trim(mmr_cbsid)='^' and mmr_month='^' and mmr_year='^'

select slno, mon_hedgeddetailscbsid, mon_hedgeddetailscbsaccountno, mon_hedgeddetailsmonth, mon_hedgeddetailsyear, mon_hedgeddetailssalesquarter, mon_hedgeddetailssalesamount, mon_hedgeddetailsnature, mon_hedgeddetailsamount, mon_hedgeddetailswhetherhedged, mon_hedgeddetailsexcessmonth, mon_hedgeddetailsexcesscurrent from mon_hedgeddetails where mon_hedgeddetailsmmrno='^'
select NVL(max(slno),0)+1 as slno from mon_hedgeddetails where mon_hedgeddetailsmmrno='^'

insert into mon_hedgeddetails (slno, mon_hedgeddetailscbsid, mon_hedgeddetailscbsaccountno, mon_hedgeddetailsmonth, mon_hedgeddetailsyear, mon_hedgeddetailssalesquarter, mon_hedgeddetailssalesamount, mon_hedgeddetailsnature, mon_hedgeddetailsamount, mon_hedgeddetailswhetherhedged, mon_hedgeddetailsexcessmonth, mon_hedgeddetailsexcesscurrent, mon_hedgeddetailsmmrno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from mon_hedgeddetails where slno=? and mon_hedgeddetailsmmrno=?

select to_char(mon_recworkmonth,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_recworkmonth, mon_recworkvalue, to_char(mon_rectermmonth,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_rectermmonth, mon_rectermvalue, to_char(mon_rectermins,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_rectermins, mon_recterminsvalue, mon_recage,mon_seviceMonth, mon_recoverarrears,mon_inlandthreemonth, mon_foreignthreemonth, mon_inlandsixmonth, mon_foreignsixmonth, mon_inlandmorethansixmonth, mon_foreignmorethansixmonth, mon_inlandtotal, mon_foreigntotal from mon_recovered where monrec_mmrno='^'
delete from mon_recovered where monrec_mmrno=?

insert into mon_recovered(mon_reccbsid, mon_recmonth, mon_recyear, mon_recworkmonth, mon_recworkvalue, mon_rectermmonth, mon_rectermvalue, mon_rectermins, mon_recterminsvalue, mon_recage, mon_seviceMonth, mon_recoverarrears, mon_inlandthreemonth, mon_foreignthreemonth, mon_inlandsixmonth, mon_foreignsixmonth, mon_inlandmorethansixmonth, mon_foreignmorethansixmonth, mon_inlandtotal, mon_foreigntotal, monrec_mmrno) values(?, ?, ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into mon_personalinfo(personal_cbsid, personal_custname, personal_solid, personal_natofactivity, personal_bankarrangement, personal_address, personal_phone, personal_constitution, personal_bankingsince, personal_lastreviewdate) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'))
delete from mon_personalinfo where personal_cbsid=?
update mon_personalinfo set personal_bankarrangement=?, personal_contactname=?, personal_contperdesign=?, personal_contperphone=?, personal_contpermobile=? where personal_cbsid=?
select to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_coveramt from insurance_register where ins_accountno='^' and ins_cbsid='^' and ins_policyno='^' and ins_delflag='N'
select LIMIT_CUTACCNO, LIMIT_FACILITY, stat_data_desc1 from mon_limitregister, static_data where stat_data_desc = LIMIT_FACILITY and stat_data_id='36' and limit_custid='^' and limit_status='O'
select mon_custid,mon_auditorcomments, mon_officerscomments, to_char(mon_auditdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_auditdate, mon_audittype from mon_auditcomments where mon_mmrno='^'

insert into mon_generalinfo( gen_custid, gen_month, gen_year, gen_acc_clasification, gen_accStressY, gen_accstress_reason, gen_accrestructY, gen_termscompiledY, gen_termscompiledreasons, gen_presentyearrating, gen_prevyearrating, gen_downgradereason, gen_docobtained, gen_creditauditdate, gen_docvetted, gen_docvettedreasons, gen_docdeficiencies, gen_borrowerdate, roc_reasons, mon_deviation, mon_compliance, gen_mmrno, gen_lawyername) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
delete from mon_generalinfo where gen_mmrno=?

select gen_acc_clasification, gen_accStressY, gen_accstress_reason, gen_accrestructY, gen_termscompiledY, gen_termscompiledreasons, gen_presentyearrating, gen_prevyearrating, gen_downgradereason, gen_docobtained, to_char(gen_creditauditdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as gen_creditauditdate, gen_docvetted, gen_docvettedreasons, gen_docdeficiencies, to_char(gen_borrowerdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as gen_borrowerdate, roc_reasons, mon_deviation, to_char(mon_compliance,'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_compliance,gen_lawyername from mon_generalinfo where gen_mmrno='^'
select to_char(max(mon_dbcdate), 'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_dbcdate from mon_checklist where cbs_accno in (^)
SELECT to_char(mon_rocdate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_rocdate , mon_roc from mon_checklist where cbs_accno in (^) order by mon_dbcdate desc

select distinct(to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')) as limit_reviewdate, s.stat_data_desc1 as limit_sancauth,p.stat_data_desc1 as limit_sanctionlevel from mon_limitregister, static_data s , static_data p where s.stat_data_desc=limit_sancauth and p.stat_data_desc(+) = limit_sanctionlevel and limit_custid='^' and limit_status='O' and s.stat_data_id='21' and p.stat_data_id(+)='20'

insert into MON_EXCESS_REASON(gen_custid, gen_reasons, gen_commencements, gen_month, gen_year, renewalcompiled, ren_submitted, ren_submitted_reasons, roc_reasons, gen_mmrno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
select gen_custid, gen_reasons, gen_commencements, renewalcompiled, to_char(ren_submitted,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ren_submitted, ren_submitted_reasons, roc_reasons from MON_EXCESS_REASON where gen_mmrno='^'
delete from MON_EXCESS_REASON where gen_mmrno=?
select stat_data_desc1 from static_data where stat_data_id='38' and stat_data_desc='^'

select cbs_accno, mon_roc, to_char(mon_rocdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as mon_rocdate, to_char(mon_resolutiondate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as mon_resolutiondate, mon_dbc, to_char(mon_dbcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as mon_dbcdate, mon_dbcamount, mon_guarantor, mon_guarantorsigned, mon_equitable, mon_equitperfect, mon_checkmsod, mon_checkstock, mon_checkbkdebts, mon_checkqpr, mon_inspection from mon_checklist where cbs_accno in (^)

update INSURANCE_REGISTER set INS_DETAILS=?, ins_insuredaddr1=?, ins_insuredaddr2=?, ins_insuredaddr3=?, ins_insuredcity=?, ins_insuredstate=?, ins_insuredpincode=?, ins_covernote=?, ins_premiumamt=?, ins_beneficiary=?, INS_CLAUSE=?, ins_paid_by=?, INS_RISK=?, ins_riskfactor=?, modified_by=?, modified_date=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where trim(INS_ACCOUNTNO)=? and ins_srlno=?

select FUND_CUSTID, FUND_ACCNO, FUND_SCHEMECODE, FUND_SANCAMT, FUND_DRAWINGPOWER, FUND_OSAMT, FUND_OVERDUEAMT, to_char(FUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as FUND_OVERDUESINCE, FUND_DEBITCURRMONTH, FUND_CREDITCURRMONTH, FUND_CREDITURNOVER, FUND_INSTALMENT, stat_data_desc1 from MON_FUNDBASED, static_data where stat_data_desc(+)=FUND_SCHEMECODE and stat_data_id(+)='36' and FUND_CUSTID='^'

insert into mmr_consortium (mmr_sno, mmr_cbsid, mmr_cbsaccountno, mmr_bankname, mmr_branch, mmr_sharepercent, mmr_assetclasification, mmr_fundbasedname, mmr_fundbasedamount, mmr_nonfundbasedname, mmr_nonfundbasedamount, mmr_overdue, mmr_remarks, mmr_leadbank, mmr_month, mmr_year, mmr_nonfundsharepercent, mmr_fundsharepercent, cons_mmrno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

insert into mon_workingcapitalfunds (mon_workcbsid, mon_workaccno, mon_workmonth, mon_workyear, mon_workyear1, mon_workyear4,mon_workmmrno) select mon_workcbsid, mon_workaccno, ?, ?, mon_workyear1, mon_workyear4,? from mon_workingcapitalfunds where mon_workmmrno=?

insert into mmr_facilitiesannex(cbsid, fac_month, fac_year, fac_sno, fac_parent, fac_facility, fac_group, fac_category, fac_sancamt, fac_os, fac_overdue, fac_dp, fac_validupto, fac_reasons, FAC_MMRNO) select cbsid,?,?, fac_sno, fac_parent, fac_facility, fac_group, fac_category, fac_sancamt,fac_os, fac_overdue, fac_dp, fac_validupto, fac_reasons,? from mmr_facilitiesannex where FAC_MMRNO=?

insert into mon_borrowerinfo (borrower_bankarrangement, borrower_contactname, borrower_contperdesign, borrower_landline, borrower_contpermobile, borrower_leadbankvetted, borrower_stipdocuments, borrower_mmrno, borrower_cbsid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select borrower_bankarrangement, borrower_contactname, borrower_contperdesign, borrower_landline, borrower_contpermobile, borrower_leadbankvetted, borrower_stipdocuments from mon_borrowerinfo where borrower_mmrno='^'
delete from mon_borrowerinfo where borrower_mmrno=?

select MMRFUND_CUSTID, MMRFUND_ACCNO, MMRFUND_FACILITY, MMRFUND_SANCAMT, MMRFUND_DRAWINGPOWER, MMRFUND_OSAMT, MMRFUND_OVERDUEAMT, to_char(MMRFUND_OVERDUESINCE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MMRFUND_OVERDUESINCE, MMRFUND_DEBITCURRMONTH, MMRFUND_CREDITCURRMONTH, MMRFUND_CREDITURNOVER, MMRFUND_INSTALMENT, to_char(MMRFUND_MODIFIEDDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MMRFUND_MODIFIEDDATE from mon_mmrfundbased where MMRFUND_FACILITY !='LC' and mmrfund_facility !='LG' and mmrfund_facility!='BL' and mmrfund_mmrno='^'
select NVL(max(fac_sno),0)+1 from mmr_facilitiesannex where fac_mmrno='^'

insert into mmr_facilitiesannex(cbsid,fac_month, fac_year,fac_sno, fac_parent, fac_facility, fac_group, fac_category, fac_sancamt,fac_os, fac_overdue, fac_dp, fac_validupto, fac_reasons, fac_mmrno) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?)

select fac_sno,f.facility_catdesc as facility_headid,g.facility_catdesc as facility, fac_parent,fac_facility,fac_group,fac_category, fac_sancamt,fac_os, fac_overdue,fac_dp,to_char(fac_validupto,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fac_validupto,fac_reasons from mmr_facilitiesannex, facility_master f, facility_master g where f.facility_catid=fac_parent AND f.facility_parent=0 and g.facility_catid=fac_facility AND g.facility_parent!=0 and fac_mmrno='^' order by fac_category desc, fac_group, fac_sno
delete from mmr_facilitiesannex where fac_mmrno=? and fac_sno=?
update mmr_facilitiesannex set fac_category=? where fac_mmrno=? and fac_group=?
insert into mon_mail_comments (MAIL_COMMENTS, mail_userid, mail_date, mail_touser, monmail_mmrno) values (?,?,sysdate,?,?)

select mail_comments, mail_userid, to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as mail_date, mail_touser, user_designation, usr_fname, mail_pano from mon_mail_comments, users where usr_id=mail_userid and monmail_mmrno='^' order by mail_date DESC
update mon_monthlyreport set mmr_status=?, mmr_closeddate=sysdate where mmr_cbsid=? and mmr_orgscode =? and mmr_no!=? and mmr_status !='C'

select mon_msodcbsid,mon_msodcbsaccountno, (mon_msodproduction+mon_msodgrosssales+mon_msodnetsales+mon_msodprodqty+mon_msodprodcurrent)as dp , mon_msodmonth from MON_MSODESTIMATES where mon_msodcbsid='^' and mon_msodcbsaccountno='^'
select FUND_OSAMT from MON_FUNDBASED where FUND_ACCNO='^'
select to_char(LC_LCopendate,'dd/mm/yyyy')as LC_LCOPENDATE, to_char(LC_BILLS_NOTIONAL_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as LC_BILLS_NOTIONAL_DATE from MON_lc where lc_bills_no='^'
select GUARANTEE_NUMBER, GUARANTEE_INVOKEDATE, GUARANTEE_BENEFICIARYNAME from MON_GUARANTEE where GUARANTEE_CBSID='^'
select to_char(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as LIMIT_REVIEWDATE from MON_LIMITREGISTER where LIMIT_CUSTID='^' and trim(limit_cutaccno)='^'
select to_char(INS_EXPIRYDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy')as INS_EXPIRYDATE, INS_COVERAMT, stock_value from mon_stockstatement, INSURANCE_REGISTER where stock_accno(+)=INS_ACCOUNTNO and INS_ACCOUNTNO='^'
insert into mon_monthlyreport(mmr_MONTH, mmr_YEAR, mmr_CBSID, mmr_STATUS, mmr_ORGsCODE, MMR_NO, mmr_usrid, mmr_rptholder, mmr_createdate)values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate)
insert into monmailbox(monmail_fromusrid, monmail_tousrid, monmail_fromflowpoint, monmail_toflowpoint, monmail_date, monmail_cbsname, monmail_mmrno, mon_type) values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)
select count(*) as cnt from mon_monthlyreport where mmr_rptholder='^' and upper(mmr_status)!='C'

select count(*) from monmailbox a,mon_monthlyreport mmr where a.monmail_tousrid= mmr.mmr_rptholder and a.monmail_date=(select max(b.monmail_date) from monmailbox b where b.monmail_mmrno =a.monmail_mmrno) and a.monmail_mmrno=mmr.mmr_no and mmr.mmr_rptholder='^' and mmr.mmr_status!='C'

select personal_cbsid, personal_custname, personal_solid, personal_natofactivity, personal_bankarrangement, personal_address, personal_address1, c.city_name as city, s.state_name as state, personal_pincode, personal_phone, personal_mobile, stat_data_desc1 as personal_constitution, to_char(personal_bankingsince,'dd/mm/yyyy')as personal_bankingsince, personal_contactname, personal_contperdesign, personal_contperphone, personal_contpermobile, personal_constitution as new_personal_constitution,personal_leadbankvetted,personal_stipdocuments,mmr_cbsid, mmr_orgscode from mon_personalinfo, laps_cities c, laps_states s, static_data, mon_monthlyreport where personal_cbsid=mmr_cbsid and upper(c.city_code(+))=upper(trim(personal_city)) and upper(s.state_code(+))=upper(trim(personal_state)) and stat_data_id(+)='14' and stat_data_desc(+)=personal_constitution and mmr_cbsid='^' and mmr_month='^' and mmr_year ='^'

select mmr_MONTH, mmr_YEAR, mmr_orgscode, mmr_status, mmr_no,mmr_rptholder,org_name from mon_monthlyreport,organisations where org_scode=mmr_orgscode and mmr_CBSID='^' and mmr_MONTH='^' and mmr_YEAR='^' order by to_number(mmr_MONTH) desc

select mmr_MONTH, mmr_YEAR, mmr_orgscode, mmr_status, mmr_no,mmr_rptholder,org_name from mon_monthlyreport,organisations where org_scode=mmr_orgscode and mmr_CBSID='^' and mmr_YEAR='^' order by to_number(mmr_MONTH) desc
select mmr_month, mmr_year, mmr_status, mmr_cbsid, mmr_no from mon_monthlyreport where mmr_cbsid='^' and mmr_no!='^' and mmr_status!='C'
update mon_monthlyreport set mmr_status=?, mmr_rptholder=? where mmr_no=?

select monmail_tousrid from monmailbox a where a.monmail_cbsid='^' and a.monmail_month='^' and a.monmail_year='^' and monmail_date=(SELECT max(monmail_date) from monmailbox b where b.monmail_cbsid='^' and b.monmail_month='^' and b.monmail_year='^')
select max(con_seqid)+1 as maxid from mon_consortium where con_cbsid='^'

insert into MON_CONSORTIUM (CON_CBSID, CON_BANKDATE, CON_LEAD, CON_FACILITY, CON_SHARES, CON_ASSET, CON_OUTSTANDING, CON_DRAWING, CON_SANCTION, CON_REMARKS,CON_SEQID) values(?,TO_DATE(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

select CON_SEQID, CON_CBSID, TO_CHAR(CON_BANKDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') as CON_BANKDATE,CON_LEAD, CON_FACILITY, CON_SHARES,CON_ASSET,CON_OUTSTANDING,CON_DRAWING, CON_SANCTION,CON_REMARKS from mon_consortium where CON_CBSID='^'
delete from mon_consortium where con_cbsid=? and con_seqid=?
select NVL(max(doc_sno+1),1) as snorelmax from mon_documentregister

insert into mon_documentregister (doc_sno, doc_accountnumber, doc_documentname, doc_executeddate, doc_executedby, doc_signatoryname, doc_expirydate, doc_vettedby, doc_datevetted, doc_modifiedby, doc_datemodified,doc_applicantype,doc_signed) values(?, ?, ?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?, ?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'), ?, to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
update mon_documentregister set doc_executedby=?, doc_signatoryname=?, doc_vettedby=?,doc_datevetted=to_date(?,'DD/MM/YYYY'), doc_applicantype=?, doc_signed=? where doc_sno=? and doc_accountnumber=?
update mon_limitregister set limit_status=?, limit_dateclosed=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where limit_custid=? and trim(limit_cutaccno)=?

select stkstm.MSU_ACCTNO, stkstm.MSU_CUSTID, TO_CHAR(stkstm.msu_secu_date,'DD/MM/YYYY') as msu_secu_date, stkstm.msu_scm_code, stkstm.msu_secu_code, stkstm.msu_solid, per.personal_custname, stkstm.MSU_ACCFLAG from mon_sdr_upl stkstm, MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_CBSID=stkstm.MSU_CUSTID and to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(to_char(MSU_SECU_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ and to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy')-to_date(to_char(MSU_SECU_DATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ and MSU_SECU_DATE is not null and stkstm.msu_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by stkstm.MSU_ACCFLAG desc
select NVL(max(mon_accwisesno+1),1) as accwisesno from mon_accountwisedetails where mon_mmrno='^'

select sum(mmr_uptooneeightyamount+mmr_abvoneeightyamount) as oldernintyvalue,sum(mmr_uptooneeightyamount+mmr_abvoneeightyamount+mmr_uptoninetyamount) as grant_total from mmr_bookdebits where mmr_cbsaccountno='^' and mmr_no='^'

select ins_srlno ins_seqid, ins_cbsid, ins_security, ins_company, ins_policyno, ins_clause, ins_coveramt, ins_premiumamt, ins_paid_by, ins_beneficiary, to_char(ins_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, ins_risk, ins_details, ins_covernote, to_char(ins_policydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as policydate, to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_riskfactor,ins_insuredaddr1, ins_insuredaddr2, ins_insuredaddr3, ins_insuredcity, ins_insuredstate,ins_insuredpincode,ins_accountno from insurance_register where ins_accountno='^' and ins_cbsid='^' and ins_srlno='^'
select count(*) as cnt from tlr_applications where tlr_holder='^' and upper(tlr_status) not like 'C_'

select count(mon_termloanreview_cbsid) from mon_termloanreview_mailbox a, tlr_applications where mon_termloanreview_tousrid='^' and upper(tlr_status) not like 'C_' and mon_termloanreview_cbsid=tlr_cbsid and MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_CBSACCNO = tlr_appno and mon_termloanreview_maildate=(select max(mon_termloanreview_maildate) from mon_termloanreview_mailbox b where a.MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_CBSACCNO=b.MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_CBSACCNO)

select tlr_appno,personal_custname,tlr_cbsid,org_name,tlr_status, mon_termloanreview_fromusrid,mon_termloanreview_tousrid, to_char(mon_termloanreview_maildate, 'dd/mm/yyyy') as mon_termloanreview_maildate, tlr_year from mon_termloanreview_mailbox a, mon_personalinfo, tlr_applications,organisations where mon_termloanreview_maildate=(select max(mon_termloanreview_maildate) from mon_termloanreview_mailbox b where a.mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno=b.mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno) and org_scode=tlr_orgcode and mon_termloanreview_tousrid = '^' and personal_cbsid=tlr_cbsid and mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno=tlr_appno and upper(tlr_status) not like 'C_' order by mon_termloanreview_maildate
update insurance_register set ins_delflag=? where trim(INS_ACCOUNTNO)=? and ins_srlno=? and ins_policyno=?
update mon_documentregister set doc_delflag=? where doc_sno=? and doc_accountnumber=?

select monmail_toflowpoint,to_char(monmail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), monmail_tousrid from monmailbox a where monmail_date=(select max(monmail_date) from monmailbox b where b.mon_type='C' and b.monmail_mmrno=a.monmail_mmrno) and a.monmail_mmrno='^'

insert into mon_termloanreview_mailbox(mon_termloanreview_cbsid, mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno, mon_termloanreview_tousrid, mon_termloanreview_fromusrid, mon_termloanreview_maildate, mon_termloanreview_year)values(?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)

select MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_TOUSRID||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname as touserid, mon_termloanreview_fromusrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||''||usr2.usr_lname fromuserid, to_char(mon_termloanreview_maildate,'dd/mm/yyyyHH24:MI:SS') as mon_termloanreview_maildate from mon_termloanreview_mailbox,users usr1,users usr2 where mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno='^' and MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_TOUSRID = usr1.usr_id and mon_termloanreview_fromusrid = usr2.usr_id order by mon_termloanreview_maildate
select org_head from mon_monthlyreport, users, organisations where org_code=usr_orgcode and usr_id=mmr_rptholder and mmr_cbsid='^' and mmr_month='^' and mmr_year='^'

select distinct limit_custid, per.personal_custname, to_char(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE,'Month DD YYYY') as revdate, to_date(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as reviewdate, to_char(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as daterev, mon.LIMIT_ACCFLAG from mon_limitregister mon,MON_PERSONALINFO per,organisations org where (to_date(to_char(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 0 and (to_date(to_char(LIMIT_REVIEWDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy'))-to_date(to_char(sysdate,'dd/mm/yyyy'),'dd/mm/yyyy') ^ 90 and LIMIT_REVIEWDATE is not null and per.personal_classification='001' and per.personal_cbsid=mon.limit_custid and mon.LIMIT_STATUS ='O' and mon.limit_solid=org.solid and org.org_code='^' order by reviewdate, mon.LIMIT_ACCFLAG
select tlr_comments from tlr_financialcomments where tlr_appno='^'
insert into tlr_financialcomments (tlr_appno,tlr_comments) values (?,?)
delete from tlr_financialcomments where tlr_appno=?

select stat_data_desc1 as facility, limit_sanctamt from mon_limitregister, static_data where limit_facility=stat_data_desc and stat_data_id='36' and to_char(limit_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy')='^' and limit_custid='^' and limit_status='O'
select mmr_MONTH as max_month, mmr_YEAR as max_year from mon_monthlyreport where mmr_CBSID='^' and mmr_status!='C'

select decode(MONSEC_SECURITYTYPE,'1','Primary','2','Collateral') as SECURITYTYPE , STAT_DATA_DESC1, MONSEC_VALUATAMOUNT,MONSEC_SNO from MON_SECURITYREGISTER, STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=MONSEC_SECURITYNATURE and stat_data_id(+)='46' and monsec_maskflag='N' and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER='^' ORDER BY MONSEC_SNO

select decode(MONSEC_SECURITYTYPE,'1','Primary','2','Collateral') as SECURITYTYPE , STAT_DATA_DESC1, MONSEC_VALUATAMOUNT,MONSEC_SNO from MON_SECURITYREGISTER, STATIC_DATA where STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=MONSEC_SECURITYNATURE and stat_data_id(+)='46' and monsec_maskflag='N' and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER='^' and MONSEC_SNO='^' ORDER BY MONSEC_SNO

insert into mon_secuinsumap(mon_secuslrno,mon_secuamt,mon_secuinsumapaccno ,mon_secuinsumapcbsid, mon_insuslrno,mon_insuamt,mon_secuinsuexp,MON_SECINSMMRNO,MON_SECINSMONTH,MON_SECINSYEAR) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)

select mon_secuslrno ,mon_secuinsumapaccno ,mon_secuinsumapcbsid , mon_insuslrno ,mon_insuamt,mon_secuamt from mon_secuinsumap where mon_secuinsumapaccno='^' and mon_secuinsumapcbsid='^' and mon_secuslrno='^' and MON_SECINSMMRNO='^'
delete from mon_secuinsumap where MON_SECINSMMRNO =? and mon_secuinsumapcbsid=? and mon_secuinsumapaccno=? and mon_secuslrno=?

select personal_cbsid, personal_custname,tlr_holder,tlr_status,tlr_year,tlr_valuesin,org_name from mon_personalinfo,tlr_applications, organisations where personal_cbsid=tlr_cbsid and org_scode=tlr_orgcode and tlr_appno='^'

select MON_TERMLOANREVIEW_TOUSRID from mon_termloanreview_mailbox where mon_termloanreview_cbsid='^' and mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno='^' and mon_termloanreview_year='^' and mon_termloanreview_maildate=(select max (mon_termloanreview_maildate) from mon_termloanreview_mailbox b where b.mon_termloanreview_cbsid='^' and mon_termloanreview_cbsaccno='^' and mon_termloanreview_year='^')
select ins_policyno from insurance_register where ins_policyno like '%^%'and ins_accountno='^' and ins_delflag='N'

select mmr_cbsid, mmr_year, mmr_month, mmr_no, mmr_status, mmr_rptholder, mmr_orgscode,org_name from mon_monthlyreport,organisations where org_scode=mmr_orgscode and mmr_cbsid='^' and mmr_year='^' and mmr_month='^'

select postins_date, postins_month, postins_year, postins_orgscode, (postins_date||'/'||postins_month||'/'||postins_year) as post_year, postins_status, postins_no, postins_type, postins_cbsid, postins_usrid from postinspection where postins_cbsid ='^' and postins_year ='^' order by post_year desc

select postins_month, postins_year, postins_orgscode, postins_status, postins_no, postins_type, postins_cbsid, postins_usrid, postins_holder, postins_sancauthcomments, to_char(postins_approvedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as postins_approvedate, org_name from postinspection, organisations where org_scode=POSTINS_ORGSCODE and postins_no ='^'
update postinspection set postins_type=? where postins_no=?

select postins_facsno, postins_facscheme, postins_facname, postins_faclimit, postins_facos, postins_facoverdueamt, postins_purpose from postinspection_facilities where postins_no='^' order by postins_facsno
delete from postinspectionreport where postins_no=?
delete from postinspection_facilities where postins_no=?
delete from postinspection where postins_no=?

select postins_cbsid, to_char(postins_visitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as postins_visitdate, to_char(postins_previsitdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as postins_previsitdate, postins_inspectofficial1, postins_inspectofficial2, postins_inspectofficial3, postins_insofficialdesn1, postins_insofficialdesn2, postins_insofficialdesn3, postins_north, postins_east, postins_west, postins_south, postins_prisecurity, postins_collsecurity, postins_presentstatus, postins_comments, postins_document, postins_features, postins_banknameboard, postins_borrowernamebord, postins_bookmaintanance, postins_documentvalidity, postins_shorfalldeficiency, postins_developmentpurpose, postins_sinkingloan, postins_machinerypurchase, postins_seasonaloperation, postins_mediumtermloan, postins_place, to_char(postins_date,'dd/mm/yyyy') as postins_date, postins_name, postins_designation, postins_month, postins_year, postins_reviewdue from postinspectionreport where postins_no='^'
update postinspection set postins_status=?, postins_approvedby=?, postins_approvedate=sysdate where postins_cbsid =? and postins_orgscode =? and postins_status!='C'

insert into postinspection (postins_no, postins_date, postins_month, postins_year, postins_orgscode, postins_status, postins_cbsid, postins_type, postins_usrid, postins_createdate, postins_holder, postins_mailchkstatus) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?,?)

insert into postinspectionreport(postins_cbsid, postins_visitdate, postins_previsitdate, postins_inspectofficial1, postins_inspectofficial2, postins_inspectofficial3, postins_insofficialdesn1, postins_insofficialdesn2, postins_insofficialdesn3, postins_north, postins_east, postins_west, postins_south, postins_prisecurity, postins_collsecurity, postins_presentstatus, postins_comments, postins_document, postins_features, postins_banknameboard, postins_borrowernamebord, postins_bookmaintanance, postins_documentvalidity, postins_shorfalldeficiency, postins_developmentpurpose, postins_sinkingloan, postins_machinerypurchase, postins_seasonaloperation, postins_mediumtermloan, postins_place, postins_date, postins_name, postins_designation, postins_reviewdue, postins_month, postins_year, postins_no) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)

select distinct fund_custid, fund_accno, fund_schemecode, fund_sancamt, fund_drawingpower, fund_osamt, fund_overdueamt, to_char(fund_overduesince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as fund_overduesince, fund_debitcurrmonth, fund_creditcurrmonth, fund_crediturnover, fund_instalment, sd1.stat_data_desc1 as facility ,sd2.stat_data_desc1 as purpose from mon_fundbased, static_data sd1,static_data sd2,mon_limitregister where sd2.stat_data_desc(+)=limit_advancepurpose and sd2.stat_data_id(+)='22' and limit_status!='C' and limit_cutaccno=fund_accno and sd1.stat_data_desc(+)=fund_schemecode and sd1.stat_data_id(+)='36' and limit_custid = fund_custid and fund_custid='^'
select to_char(max(postins_visitdate),'dd/mm/yyyy') as postins_visitdate from postinspectionreport where postins_no like('%^')
insert into postinspection_facilities (postins_no, postins_facsno, postins_facscheme, postins_facname, postins_faclimit, postins_facos, postins_facoverdueamt, postins_purpose) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select postins_date, postins_month, postins_year, postins_type from postinspection where postins_no like('%^') order by postins_year,postins_month desc
select (nvl(max(fac_sno),0)+1) as cnt from postinspection_facannex where fac_postinsno='^'

select fac_sno, fac_headid, fachead.facility_catdesc as fac_parent, fac_facid, fac.facility_catdesc as facility, fac_group, fac_category, fac_reasons, fac_os, fac_sancamt, fac_overdue from postinspection_facannex, facility_master fac, facility_master fachead where fac.facility_catid=fac_facid and fachead.facility_catid=fac_headid and fac_postinsno='^' order by fac_group, fac_sno

select postins_fromusrid||'-'||usr1.usr_fname||' '||usr1.usr_lname, postins_tousrid||'-'||usr2.usr_fname||' '||usr2.usr_lname, to_char(postins_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS'), postins_fromusrid, postins_tousrid from postinspection_mailbox,users usr1,users usr2 where postins_fromusrid=usr1.usr_id and postins_tousrid=usr2.usr_id and postins_no='^' order by postins_date
insert into postinspection_mailbox(postins_fromusrid, postins_tousrid, postins_date, postins_no) values(?,?,sysdate,?)
update postinspection set postins_status=?, postins_approvedby=?, postins_approvedate=sysdate, postins_mailchkstatus='Y', postins_sancauthcomments=? where postins_no=?
update postinspection set postins_holder=?, postins_mailchkstatus='Y' where postins_no=?
insert into postinspection_facannex(fac_postinsno, fac_sno, fac_headid, fac_facid, fac_group, fac_category, fac_reasons, fac_os, fac_sancamt, fac_overdue) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update postinspection_facannex set fac_headid=?, fac_facid=?, fac_group=?, fac_category=?, fac_reasons=?, fac_os=?, fac_sancamt=?, fac_overdue=? where fac_sno=? and fac_postinsno=?

select PERSONAL_CBSID,PERSONAL_CUSTNAME,PERSONAL_ADDRESS,PERSONAL_ADDRESS1,city_name, personal_city,state_name,PERSONAL_STATE,PERSONAL_PINCODE from MON_PERSONALINFO,LAPS_CITIES,LAPS_STATES where personal_cbsid='^' and city_code(+)=trim(personal_city) and state_code(+)=trim(PERSONAL_STATE)

select org_name,org_add1,org_add2,ORG_STATE,org_city,org_zip,city_name,state_name from ORGANISATIONS,LAPS_CITIES,LAPS_STATES where org_scode='^' and city_code(+)=trim(org_city) and state_code(+)=trim(ORG_STATE)

select MONSEC_SNO, MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER, MONSEC_SECURITYTYPE,MONSEC_SECURITYNATURE,MONSEC_OTHERDETAILS, MONSEC_ADD1,MONSEC_ADD2,MONSEC_CITY,MONSEC_STATE, MONSEC_PINCODE, MONSEC_VALUATAMOUNT, to_char(MONSEC_VALUATDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MONSEC_VALUATDATE,MONSEC_VALUTDONEBY, MONSEC_INSPECTEDBY, to_char(MONSEC_INSPECTEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MONSEC_INSPECTEDON, MONSEC_SAMEADDRESS, monsec_shortfallnoticed,MON_INSUSLRNO,to_char(MON_SECUINSUEXP,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MON_SECUINSUEXP, MON_INSUAMT,STAT_DATA_DESC1, STAT_DATA_SNO, monsec_maskflag from MON_SECURITYREGISTER,mon_secuinsumap,static_data where MONSEC_SNO=MON_SECUSLRNO(+) and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER=MON_SECUINSUMAPACCNO(+) and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER(+)='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=MONSEC_SECURITYNATURE and stat_data_id='46' and MON_SECINSMMRNO(+)='^'

insert into tlr_facilities(tlr_no,tlr_facno,tlr_facscheme,tlr_facname,tlr_existlimit,tlr_proposed,tlr_oslimit, tlr_intrecomm,tlr_intremarks,tlr_overdue,tlr_loanpurpose,tlr_cbsaccno) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update tlr_facilities set tlr_proposed=?,tlr_loanpurpose=?,tlr_intrecomm=?,tlr_intremarks=? where tlr_no=? and tlr_facno=?

select tlr_no, tlr_facno, tlr_facscheme, tlr_facname, tlr_existlimit, tlr_proposed, tlr_oslimit, tlr_intrecomm, tlr_intremarks, tlr_overdue, tlr_loanpurpose, tlr_cbsaccno from tlr_facilities where tlr_no ='^' order by tlr_facno
delete from tlr_facilities where tlr_no=?

insert into tlr_generaldetails(tlr_appno,tlr_proposaltype,tlr_activity,tlr_banksince,tlr_assetclassify,tlr_renewal,tlr_facilitysince, tlr_nextreview,tlr_indcode) values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)

update tlr_generaldetails set tlr_proposaltype=?,tlr_activity=?,tlr_banksince=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),tlr_assetclassify=?,tlr_renewal=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),tlr_facilitysince=?, tlr_nextreview=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),tlr_indcode=? where tlr_appno=?

select tlr_proposaltype,tlr_activity,to_char(tlr_banksince,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_banksince,tlr_assetclassify,to_char(tlr_renewal,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_renewal,tlr_facilitysince, to_char(tlr_nextreview,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_nextreview,tlr_indcode, sd.stat_data_desc1 as assetstatdesc from tlr_generaldetails,static_data sd where sd.stat_data_desc(+)=tlr_assetclassify and sd.stat_data_id(+)='31' and tlr_appno='^'
delete from tlr_generaldetails where tlr_appno=?
insert into tlr_briefbackgroud(tlr_appno,tlr_comments) values(?,?)
delete from tlr_briefbackgroud where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_comments from tlr_briefbackgroud where tlr_appno='^'
insert into tlr_presentstatus(tlr_appno,tlr_comments) values(?,?)
delete from tlr_presentstatus where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_comments from tlr_presentstatus where tlr_appno='^'
insert into tlr_others(tlr_appno,tlr_comments) values(?,?)
delete from tlr_others where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_comments from tlr_others where tlr_appno='^'
insert into tlr_cdaccount(tlr_appno,tlr_maxdebit,tlr_mindebit,tlr_maxcredit,tlr_mincredit,tlr_noofdaysdebit,tlr_noofdayscredit) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from tlr_cdaccount where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_maxdebit,tlr_mindebit,tlr_maxcredit,tlr_mincredit,tlr_noofdaysdebit,tlr_noofdayscredit from tlr_cdaccount where tlr_appno='^'
insert into tlr_tlaccount(tlr_appno,tlr_disbursaldate,tlr_repay,tlr_instalmentpaid,tlr_intserviced) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?)
delete from tlr_tlaccount where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_appno,to_char(tlr_disbursaldate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_disbursaldate,tlr_repay,tlr_instalmentpaid,tlr_intserviced from tlr_tlaccount where tlr_appno='^'

insert into tlr_proposaldetails(tlr_appno,tlr_proposaldate,tlr_sancauthority,tlr_agendano,tlr_mcmdate,tlr_signatories, tlr_mcmresolution,tlr_gridmeeting,tlr_meetingdate,tlr_refno) values(?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
delete from tlr_proposaldetails where tlr_appno=?

select tlr_appno,to_char(tlr_proposaldate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_proposaldate,tlr_sancauthority,tlr_agendano,to_char(tlr_mcmdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_mcmdate,tlr_signatories, tlr_mcmresolution,tlr_gridmeeting,to_char(tlr_meetingdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_meetingdate,tlr_refno from tlr_proposaldetails where tlr_appno='^'

insert into tlr_compliance(tlr_appno,tlr_formalities,tlr_registrationcharge,tlr_doccheck, tlr_dbcdate,tlr_inspectiondate,tlr_secdesc,tlr_observ) values(?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?)
delete from tlr_compliance where tlr_appno=?

select tlr_formalities,tlr_registrationcharge,tlr_doccheck, to_char(tlr_dbcdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_dbcdate,to_char(tlr_inspectiondate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_inspectiondate,tlr_secdesc,tlr_observ from tlr_compliance where tlr_appno='^'
insert into tlr_termsdetails(tlr_appno,tlr_condtions) values(?,?)
delete from tlr_termsdetails where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_condtions from tlr_termsdetails where tlr_appno='^'

insert into tlr_bankingdetails(tlr_appno,tlr_group,tlr_status,tlr_reviewdate,tlr_bankarrangement, tlr_leadbank,tlr_ourshare,tlr_agencyname,tlr_lastrating,tlr_currating) values(?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from tlr_bankingdetails where tlr_appno=?

select tlr_group,tlr_status,to_char(tlr_reviewdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_reviewdate,tlr_bankarrangement, tlr_leadbank,tlr_ourshare,tlr_agencyname,tlr_lastrating,tlr_currating,to_char(tlr_reviewdate,'MON-YYYY') as tlr_reviewdate1 from tlr_bankingdetails where tlr_appno='^'

select tlr_appno, tlr_audittype, tlr_auditorcomments, tlr_officercomments,to_char(tlr_auditdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_auditdate, tlr_auditsno from tlr_auditobservations where tlr_appno='^' and tlr_audittype='^'
select (nvl(max(tlr_auditsno),0)+1) as maxcnt from tlr_auditobservations where tlr_appno='^' and tlr_audittype='^'

select tlr_auditsno,tlr_audittype,tlr_auditorcomments, tlr_officercomments,to_char(tlr_auditdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_auditdate from tlr_auditobservations where tlr_appno='^' order by tlr_audittype,tlr_auditsno
delete from tlr_auditobservations where tlr_appno=? and tlr_audittype=? and tlr_auditsno=?
insert into tlr_auditobservations (tlr_appno, tlr_auditsno, tlr_audittype, tlr_auditorcomments, tlr_officercomments, tlr_auditdate) values (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'))
update tlr_auditobservations set tlr_auditorcomments=?, tlr_officercomments=?,tlr_auditdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy') where tlr_auditsno=? and tlr_audittype=? and tlr_appno=?
insert into tlr_securities(tlr_appno,tlr_secno,tlr_sectype, tlr_facno, tlr_secdetails, tlr_secremarks, tlr_secvalue, tlr_secdate,tlr_margin) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?)
update tlr_securities set tlr_sectype=?, tlr_facno=?, tlr_secdetails=?, tlr_secremarks=?, tlr_secvalue=?, tlr_secdate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),tlr_margin=? where tlr_appno=? and tlr_secno=?
select nvl(max(tlr_secno),0)+1 as snomax from tlr_securities where tlr_appno='^'
delete from tlr_securities where tlr_appno=? and tlr_secno=?

select tlr_secno, tlr_sectype, tlr_facno, tlr_secdetails,tlr_secremarks,tlr_secvalue, to_char(tlr_secdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_secdate,tlr_margin from tlr_securities where tlr_appno='^' order by tlr_secno
insert into tlr_promoterdetails(tlr_appno,tlr_prom_sno,tlr_prom_name, tlr_prom_desig) values (?,?,?,?)
update tlr_promoterdetails set tlr_prom_name=?, tlr_prom_desig=? where tlr_appno=? and tlr_prom_sno=?
select nvl(max(tlr_prom_sno),0)+1 as snomax from tlr_promoterdetails where tlr_appno='^'
delete from tlr_promoterdetails where tlr_appno=? and tlr_prom_sno=?
select tlr_prom_sno, tlr_prom_name, tlr_prom_desig from tlr_promoterdetails where tlr_appno='^' order by tlr_prom_sno

insert into tlr_groupconcerns(TLR_GCAPPNO,TLR_GCSNO,TLR_GCCONNAME,TLR_GCBRANCH,TLR_GCCOA,TLR_GCCOMLIMIT,TLR_GCCOMOS,TLR_GCFBWCLT, TLR_GCFBWCDP,TLR_GCFBWCOS,TLR_GCTLLT,TLR_GCTLOS,TLR_GCINS,TLR_GCMOR,TLR_GCIRREG) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update tlr_groupconcerns set TLR_GCCONNAME=?,TLR_GCBRANCH=?,TLR_GCCOA=?,TLR_GCCOMLIMIT=?,TLR_GCCOMOS=?,TLR_GCFBWCLT=?, TLR_GCFBWCDP=?,TLR_GCFBWCOS=?,TLR_GCTLLT=?,TLR_GCTLOS=?,TLR_GCINS=?,TLR_GCMOR=?,TLR_GCIRREG=? where TLR_GCAPPNO=? and TLR_GCSNO=?
select nvl(max(TLR_GCSNO),0)+1 as snomax from tlr_groupconcerns where TLR_GCAPPNO='^'
delete from tlr_groupconcerns where TLR_GCAPPNO=? and TLR_GCSNO=?

select TLR_GCCONNAME,TLR_GCBRANCH,TLR_GCCOA,TLR_GCCOMLIMIT,TLR_GCCOMOS,TLR_GCFBWCLT, TLR_GCFBWCDP,TLR_GCFBWCOS,TLR_GCTLLT,TLR_GCTLOS,TLR_GCINS,TLR_GCMOR,TLR_GCIRREG,TLR_GCSNO from tlr_groupconcerns where TLR_GCAPPNO='^' order by TLR_GCSNO
insert into tlr_applications(tlr_appno, tlr_year, tlr_cbsid, tlr_createdate, tlr_createdby, tlr_orgcode, tlr_status, tlr_holder, tlr_valuesin) values(?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,'op',?,?)
select tlr_appno,tlr_year,tlr_cbsid,tlr_status,to_char(tlr_createdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_createdate from tlr_applications where tlr_cbsid='^' and TLR_ORGCODE='^'
insert into tlr_mailboxcomments (mail_appno, mail_comments, mail_userid, mail_date, mail_touser, mail_tousrid, mail_pano) values (?,?,?,sysdate,?,?,?)

select mail_appno, mail_comments, mail_userid, to_char(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') as mail_date, mail_touser, user_designation, usr_fname, mail_pano from tlr_mailboxcomments, users where mail_appno='^' and mail_userid=usr_id order by to_date(mail_date,'dd/mm/yyyy HH24:MI:SS') DESC

select tlr_appno, tlr_audittype, tlr_auditorcomments, tlr_officercomments, to_char(tlr_auditdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_auditdate,tlr_auditsno from tlr_auditobservations where tlr_appno='^' order by tlr_audittype, tlr_auditsno

select tlr_secno, tlr_sectype, tlr_facno, tlr_secdetails,tlr_secremarks,tlr_secvalue, to_char(tlr_secdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_secdate from tlr_securities where tlr_appno='^' and tlr_sectype='^' order by tlr_secno

select tlr_secno, tlr_sectype, tlr_facno, tlr_secdetails,tlr_secremarks,tlr_secvalue, to_char(tlr_secdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_secdate,tlr_margin from tlr_securities where tlr_appno='^' and tlr_facno='^' order by tlr_secno
select sum(tlr_existlimit) as existlimit,sum(tlr_proposed) as proposedlimit from tlr_facilities where tlr_no ='^'

select tlr_appno,tlr_year,tlr_cbsid,tlr_createdate,tlr_createdby,tlr_orgcode,tlr_status, tlr_holder,tlr_comments,tlr_processedby,tlr_valuesin,org_name,to_char(tlr_processdate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as tlr_processdate from tlr_applications,organisations where org_scode=tlr_orgcode and tlr_appno ='^'
update tlr_applications set tlr_valuesin=? where tlr_appno=?
update tlr_applications set tlr_holder=? where tlr_appno=?
update tlr_applications set tlr_status=?, tlr_comments=?, tlr_processdate = sysdate,tlr_processedby=? where tlr_appno=?
update tlr_applications set tlr_status=?,tlr_closeddate = sysdate,tlr_closedby=? where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_year,tlr_status from tlr_applications where tlr_cbsid = '^'
select max(tlr_year) as tlr_maxyear from tlr_applications where tlr_cbsid = '^' and TLR_ORGCODE = '^'
insert into tlr_internalrating(tlr_appno,tlr_prevyearscore, tlr_currentyearscore,tlr_prevyeargrade , tlr_currentyeargrade, tlr_prevyearrisk, tlr_currentyearrisk) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
delete from tlr_internalrating where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_appno,tlr_prevyearscore, tlr_currentyearscore,tlr_prevyeargrade,tlr_currentyeargrade, tlr_prevyearrisk,tlr_currentyearrisk from tlr_internalrating where tlr_appno = '^'
insert into tlr_internalratingparameter(tlr_appno,tlr_paramno,tlr_paramdesc, tlr_prevyear,tlr_currentyear) values(?,?,?,?,?)
delete from tlr_internalratingparameter where tlr_appno=?
select tlr_paramdesc, tlr_prevyear,tlr_currentyear from tlr_internalratingparameter where tlr_appno = '^' order by tlr_paramno
SELECT TLR_FACNAME,TLR_EXISTLIMIT,TLR_PROPOSED,TLR_OSLIMIT,TLR_OVERDUE,TLR_LOANPURPOSE,TLR_INTRECOMM FROM TLR_FACILITIES WHERE TLR_NO = '^' AND TLR_FACNO = '^'
SELECT TLR_PROM_NAME,TLR_PROM_DESIG FROM TLR_PROMOTERDETAILS WHERE TLR_APPNO = '^' AND TLR_PROM_SNO = '^'

SELECT TLR_GCCONNAME,TLR_GCBRANCH,TLR_GCCOA,TLR_GCCOMLIMIT,TLR_GCCOMOS,TLR_GCFBWCLT,TLR_GCFBWCDP,TLR_GCFBWCOS,TLR_GCTLLT,TLR_GCTLOS, TLR_GCINS,TLR_GCMOR,TLR_GCIRREG FROM TLR_GROUPCONCERNS WHERE TLR_GCAPPNO = '^' AND TLR_GCSNO = '^'

select ins_srlno,ins_seqid, ins_cbsid, ins_security, ins_company, ins_policyno, ins_clause, ins_coveramt, ins_premiumamt, ins_paid_by, ins_beneficiary, to_char(ins_duedate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as duedate, ins_risk, ins_details, ins_covernote, to_char(ins_policydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as policydate, to_char(ins_expirydate,'dd/mm/yyyy') as ins_expirydate, ins_riskfactor,ins_insuredaddr1, ins_insuredaddr2, ins_insuredaddr3, ins_insuredcity, ins_insuredstate,ins_insuredpincode,ins_accountno from insurance_register where ins_accountno='^' and ins_cbsid='^' and ins_srlno='^' and ins_delflag='N'

select TLR_SECTYPE,sec.TLR_FACNO,TLR_MARGIN,TLR_SECVALUE,to_char(TLR_SECDATE,'DD/MM/YYYY')as TLR_SECDATE,fac.TLR_FACNAME,fac.TLR_CBSACCNO from tlr_securities sec, tlr_facilities fac where fac.tlr_facno(+)=sec.tlr_facno and fac.tlr_no(+)=sec.tlr_appno and sec.tlr_secno='^' and sec.tlr_appno='^'

select MONSEC_SNO, MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER, MONSEC_SECURITYTYPE,MONSEC_SECURITYNATURE,MONSEC_OTHERDETAILS, MONSEC_ADD1,MONSEC_ADD2,MONSEC_CITY,MONSEC_STATE, MONSEC_PINCODE, MONSEC_VALUATAMOUNT, to_char(MONSEC_VALUATDATE,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MONSEC_VALUATDATE,MONSEC_VALUTDONEBY, MONSEC_INSPECTEDBY, to_char(MONSEC_INSPECTEDON,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MONSEC_INSPECTEDON, MONSEC_SAMEADDRESS, monsec_shortfallnoticed,MON_INSUSLRNO,to_char(MON_SECUINSUEXP,'dd/mm/yyyy') as MON_SECUINSUEXP, MON_INSUAMT,STAT_DATA_DESC1, STAT_DATA_SNO, monsec_maskflag,MON_SECINSMMRNO from MON_SECURITYREGISTER,mon_secuinsumap,static_data where MONSEC_SNO=MON_SECUSLRNO(+) and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER=MON_SECUINSUMAPACCNO(+) and MONSEC_ACCOUNTNUMBER(+)='^' and STAT_DATA_DESC(+)=MONSEC_SECURITYNATURE and stat_data_id='46' and MONSEC_SNO(+)='^'
delete from POSTINSPECTION_FACANNEX where FAC_POSTINSNO = ? and FAC_SNO = ?

insert into users (usr_id, usr_grpid, usr_orgcode, usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname, usr_password, usr_class, usr_supid, usr_supstatus, usr_avail, usr_function, usr_sanction_limit, user_designation, user_first_flag) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update users set usr_grpid=?, usr_orgcode=?, usr_fname=?, usr_mname=?, usr_lname=?, usr_class=?, usr_supid=?, usr_supstatus=?, usr_avail=?, usr_function=?, usr_sanction_limit=?, usr_designation=? where usr_id=?

update users set usr_grpid=?, usr_orgcode=?, usr_fname=?, usr_mname=?, usr_lname=?, usr_class=?, usr_supid=?, usr_supstatus=?, usr_avail=?, usr_function=?, usr_sanction_limit=?, user_designation=?, usr_emailid=?,usr_department=?,usr_rmdflag=?,usr_rlpftype=? where usr_id=?
delete users where usr_id=?
update users set usr_password=?,user_first_flag=? where usr_id=?

insert into organisations(org_code, org_level, org_scode, org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_zip, org_state, org_phone, org_fax, org_taxid, org_trasitid, org_url, org_micr, org_head, org_branchType, org_branchIn, org_region, org_saaBranch, org_village, solid, org_issaral, org_saralhead ,org_internet_centre,org_centrename,org_opendate,org_district,org_excelupload_flag,org_ifsccode,org_abmid,org_abmmobile) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),?,?,?,?,?)

update organisations set org_level=?, org_scode=?, org_name=?, org_add1=?, org_add2=?, org_city=?, org_zip=?, org_state=?, org_phone=?, org_fax=?, org_taxid=?, org_trasitid=?, org_url=?, org_micr=?, org_head=?, org_branchType=?, org_branchIn=?, org_region=?, org_saaBranch=?, org_village=?, solid=?, org_issaral=?, org_saralhead=?, org_internet_centre=?, org_centrename=?, org_opendate=to_date(?,'dd/mm/yyyy'),org_district=?,org_excelupload_flag=?,org_ifsccode=?,org_abmid=?,org_abmmobile=? where org_code =?
delete from organisations where org_code = ?
insert into groups(grp_id, grp_name, grp_rights, grp_discreteid, grouplimitslist) values(?,?,?,?,?)
update groups set grp_name=?,grp_rights=?, grp_discreteid=?, grouplimitslist=? where grp_id=?
select count(*) from users where usr_grpid='^'
delete groups where grp_id=?
